hero_description: Use mobile payment methods to execute your account top-up requests.
quick_description: With LamedCash, funding and withdrawals are just a few clicks away.
secure_description: We prioritize security and convenience, ensuring your peace of mind with every transaction.
support_description: We're here for you around the clock. Our dedicated support team is ready to assist you anytime, anywhere.
enter_amount: Enter an amount of at least 100
change_or_leave: Change or leave the original number
how_does_withdrawal_work: How does the withdrawal process work with LamedCash?
first_question_description: After providing this information, your withdrawal request will be processed.
designate_specific_account_question: Can I designate a specific account for my fund withdrawals?
designate_specific_account_answer: Yes, you can designate a specific amount for your fund withdrawal, but it should be the same as your withdrawal request
